title: 820-00840 sudden reboots
message: Hi guys i got this 13 inch non touchbar that reboots every few hours. The logicboard is super clean no signs of corrosion, SSD drive tests OK with Drive DX as I know there is a recall for these. The machine is not eligible for SSD recall. Are there any known issues with this machine suddenly rebooting? Ran some graphics test with Cinebench but ran fine. Are there any known issues with this machine suddenly rebooting?

title: 820-00840 sudden reboots
message:
Any history available?
First discard software issue testing with another OSX through USB-C adapter.
Also try clean ME BIOS.
